Journey.title: Our Journey
Journey.description: Our Tahiti Lime and other products are grown and delivered with precision and care. With over 8 years of experience we know how to deliver the best quality on the market.

text.1: I am Pablo Alzate, President of CIMA PRODUCE INC. My career in the world of produce began 15 years ago in the Colombian market, where I acquired knowledge about the purchase, sale and management of products, especially citrus fruits.
text.2: Approximately ten years ago I moved to the United States and found the opportunity to work in the Miami market through a family business. I started from scratch, as a forklift driver in the plaza, but this experience allowed me to thoroughly understand the products and how the market in the US works.
text.3: Over time, I ventured into the retail sector and directly served citrus customers, which gave me comprehensive knowledge of the entire production chain: from harvesting in the fields to optimal distribution to customers. That's when CIMA PRODUCE INC was born.

Certificates.title: Certifications that support us
Certificates.description: Our commitment is to provide freshness, flavor and excellence in every shipment, supported by a solid network of certified producers and a team dedicated to ensuring the satisfaction of our business partners.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: We have over 8 years of experience marketing agricultural products and building strong business relationships throughout North America.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: Our commitment is to be the bridge between agricultural producers in Latin America and wholesale markets in North America, offering quality with the highest standards.

quality.title: Maximum Quality
quality.description: Shipping excellence is guaranteed and certified. We have a team dedicated to ensuring the quality of the shipment of agricultural products.

prices.title: Best Prices
prices.description: CIMA offers highly competitive wholesale products, offering high quality and shipping efficiency.

FAQs.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQs.description: Don't forget to contact us for more information and to resolve any questions you may have.

question1.question: Where are the products imported from?
question1.answer: We import Tahiti limes primarily from Colombia and Mexico. We also offer other seasonal products from various regions.

question2.question: What kind of products do you offer besides Tahiti limes?
question2.answer: In addition to Tahiti limes, we work with a variety of seasonal produce, including bananas, carrots, oranges, watermelon, and other fresh fruits and vegetables. Our offering varies depending on the season and availability.

question3.question: How do you manage transportation and logistics?
question3.answer: We have an efficient and reliable logistics network that ensures products arrive fresh and in the best condition.

FAQs.title: Frequently asked questions
FAQs.description: Don't forget to contact us for more information and to resolve any questions you may have.

question1.question: What courses do you offer?
question1.answer: We offer a variety of courses across subjects like programming, data science, design, and business management.

question2.question: How long do the courses take?
question2.answer: Course duration varies; some are completed in a few hours while others may take several weeks, depending on the depth of the content.

question3.question: Are the courses self-paced?
question3.answer: Yes, our courses are self-paced, allowing you to learn at your own speed and convenience.

question4.question: Do I receive a certificate upon completion?
question4.answer: Yes, upon completing a course, you will receive a certificate that you can download and share.

question5.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
question5.answer: Absolutely! If you are not satisfied with a course, you can request a full refund within 30 of purchase.

question6.question: Can I access the courses on mobile devices?
question6.answer: Yes, our platform is mobile-friendly, allowing you to access courses on smartphones and.
